verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, And Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹנָתָ֤ן <S%H3129><s%> yo-na-Tan to Jonathan בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav, and to all his servants לְהָמִ֖ית <S%H4191><s%> le-ha-Mit that they should kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; David וִיהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3129><s%> vi-ho-na-Tan Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, Saul's חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fetz delighted בְּדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> be-da-Vid David מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. greatly

וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged told יְהוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan But Jonathan לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid in David לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying מְבַקֵּ֛שׁ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Kesh seeketh שָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul's אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi my father לַהֲמִיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4191><s%> la-ha-mi-Te-cha; to kill וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now הִשָּֽׁמֶר־ <S%H8104><s%> hish-sha-mer- thee now therefore I pray thee take heed נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na please בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> vab-Bo-ker, to thyself until the morning וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֥ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-shav-Ta and abide בַסֵּ֖תֶר <S%H5643><s%> vas-Se-ter in a secret וְנַחְבֵּֽאתָ׃ <S%H2244><s%> ve-nach-Be-ta. [place] and hide

וַאֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אֵצֵ֜א <S%H3318><s%> 'e-Tze And I will go out וְעָמַדְתִּ֣י <S%H5975><s%> ve-'a-mad-Ti and stand לְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> le-yad- beside אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi, my father בַּשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh in the field אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, in it וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> 'a-dab-Ber where thou [art] and I will commune בְּךָ֖ be-Cha אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- with אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi; with my father וְרָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'I-ti I see מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> mah of thee and what וְהִגַּ֥דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> ve-hig-Gad-ti that I will tell לָֽךְ׃ Lach. ס sa-Mek

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוֹנָתָ֤ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan And Jonathan בְּדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> be-da-Vid of David ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov, good אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul unto Saul אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> 'E-lav about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יֶחֱטָ֨א <S%H2398><s%> ye-che-Ta sin הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech unto him Let not the king בְּעַבְדּ֣וֹ <S%H5650><s%> be-'av-Do against his servant בְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid, against David כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki since ל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> Lo has not חָטָא֙ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta because he hath not sinned לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi and since מַעֲשָׂ֖יו <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sav against thee and because his works טוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> tov- good לְךָ֥ le-Cha מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. [have been] to thee-ward very

וַיָּשֶׂם֩ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-Sem For he did put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשׁ֨וֹ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho his life בְכַפּ֜וֹ <S%H3709><s%> ve-chap-Po in his hand וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֗י <S%H6430><s%> hap-pe-lish-Ti, the Philistine וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as wrought יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֤ה <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'Ah salvation גְדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah a great לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, for all Israel רָאִ֖יתָ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ta thou sawest וַתִּשְׂמָ֑ח <S%H8055><s%> vat-tis-Mach; [it] and didst rejoice וְלָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> ve-Lam-mah Why תֶֽחֱטָא֙ <S%H2398><s%> te-che-Ta wherefore then wilt thou sin בְּדָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> be-Dam blood נָקִ֔י <S%H5355><s%> na-Ki, against innocent לְהָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> le-ha-Mit to slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam. without

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' hearkened שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And Saul בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol unto the voice יְהוֹנָתָ֑ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan; of Jonathan וַיִּשָּׁבַ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-sha-Va' sware שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, and Saul חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- liveth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [As] the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- he shall not יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. be slain

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called יְהוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan And Jonathan לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, David וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-ged- shewed לוֹ֙ lo יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-Ho-na-Tan, and Jonathan אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim him all those things הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; these וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve brought יְהוֹנָתָ֤ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan And Jonathan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, to Saul וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi was in לְפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav and he was in his presence כְּאֶתְמ֥וֹל <S%H865><s%> ke-'et-Mol before time שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom. before that time ס sa-Mek

וַתּ֥וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> vat-To-sef again הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah And there was war לִֽהְי֑וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot; become וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid and David וַיִּלָּ֣חֶם <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-La-chem and fought בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> bap-pe-lish-Tim, with the Philistines וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach and slew בָּהֶם֙ ba-Hem מַכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> mak-Kah slaughter גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah, them with a great וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nu-su and they fled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nav. from

וַתְּהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi become ר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach spirit יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh from the LORD רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah And the evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, was upon Saul וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he בְּבֵית֣וֹ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-To in his house יוֹשֵׁ֔ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev, as he sat וַחֲנִית֖וֹ <S%H2595><s%> va-cha-ni-To with his javelin בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do; in his hand וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid and David מְנַגֵּ֥ן <S%H5059><s%> me-nag-Gen played בְּיָֽד׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad. with [his] hand

וַיְבַקֵּ֨שׁ <S%H1245><s%> vay-vak-Kesh sought שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And Saul לְהַכּ֤וֹת <S%H5221><s%> le-hak-Kot to smite בַּֽחֲנִית֙ <S%H2595><s%> ba-cha-Nit with the javelin בְּדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> be-da-Vid David וּבַקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> u-vak-Kir, even to the wall וַיִּפְטַר֙ <S%H6362><s%> vai-yif-Tar but he slipped away מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei presence שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, out of Saul's וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach and he smote אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֲנִ֖ית <S%H2595><s%> ha-cha-Nit the javelin בַּקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> bak-Kir; into the wall וְדָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid and David נָ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> nas fled וַיִּמָּלֵ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> vai-yim-ma-Let and escaped בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> bal-Lay-lah that night הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach also sent שָׁא֨וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul מַלְאָכִ֜ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid unto David's לְשָׁמְר֔וֹ <S%H8104><s%> le-sha-me-Ro, to watch וְלַהֲמִית֖וֹ <S%H4191><s%> ve-la-ha-mi-To him and to slay בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker; him in the morning וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> vat-tag-Ged told לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, David's מִיכַ֤ל <S%H4324><s%> mi-Chal and Michal אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <S%H802><s%> ish-To wife לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, him saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If אֵ֨ינְךָ֜ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-ne-cha not מְמַלֵּ֤ט <S%H4422><s%> me-mal-Let If thou save אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשְׁךָ֙ <S%H5315><s%> naf-she-Cha not thy life הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah, to night מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> ma-Char to morrow אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah him מוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> mu-Mat. thou shalt be slain

וַתֹּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vat-To-red down מִיכַ֛ל <S%H4324><s%> mi-Chal So Michal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad through הַחַלּ֑וֹן <S%H2474><s%> ha-chal-Lon; through a window וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went וַיִּבְרַ֖ח <S%H1272><s%> vai-yiv-Rach and fled וַיִּמָּלֵֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> vai-yim-ma-Let. and escaped

וַתִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach took מִיכַ֜ל <S%H4324><s%> mi-Chal And Michal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַתְּרָפִ֗ים <S%H8655><s%> hat-te-ra-Fim, an image וַתָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <S%H7760><s%> vat-Ta-sem and laid אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמִּטָּ֔ה <S%H4296><s%> ham-mit-Tah, [it] in the bed וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כְּבִ֣יר <S%H3523><s%> ke-Vir a pillow הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> ha-'iz-Zim, of goats' שָׂ֖מָה <S%H7760><s%> Sa-mah and put מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֑יו <S%H4763><s%> me-ra-'a-sho-Tav; [hair] for his bolster וַתְּכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> vat-te-Chas and covered בַּבָּֽגֶד׃ <S%H899><s%> bab-Ba-ged. [it] with a cloth ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And when Saul מַלְאָכִ֖ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers לָקַ֣חַת <S%H3947><s%> la-Ka-chat to take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; David וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer she said חֹלֶ֥ה <S%H2470><s%> cho-Leh He [is] sick הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'a-Chim, the messengers לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot [again] to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הַעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> ha-'a-Lu Bring him up אֹת֧וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בַמִּטָּ֛ה <S%H4296><s%> vam-mit-Tah to me in the bed אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about לַהֲמִתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4191><s%> la-ha-mi-To. that I may slay

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u were come in הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'a-Chim, And when the messengers וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <S%H8655><s%> hat-te-ra-Fim behold [there was] an image אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on הַמִּטָּ֑ה <S%H4296><s%> ham-mit-Tah; in the bed וּכְבִ֥יר <S%H3523><s%> u-che-Vir with a pillow הָעִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> ha-'iz-Zim of goats' מְרַאֲשֹׁתָֽיו׃ <S%H4763><s%> me-ra-'a-sho-Tav.
